Author: mimikkyu_
Text: the act of eating makes you “gain weight” by the physical presence of food in your body adding to your body weight. plus if you dont eat a lot then your body will retain water when you start eating again, and if there’s sodium in your food it will add to the weight too. none of it is fat, but unfortunately this is going to happen every time you eat unless you start eating more often so your body doesnt have to do the adjusting every time. but you aren’t gaining any real weight.
